payload.role: Parse raw input, find related context → issue_normalized.md, context_brief.md.
Synthesize normalized signal → problem_statement.md with clear success criteria.
Write functional + non-functional requirements → requirements.md following structured template.
Harsh review of requirements vs completeness, feasibility, testability → requirements_critique.md.
Write functional + non-functional requirements → requirements.md following structured template.
Harsh review of requirements vs completeness, feasibility, testability → requirements_critique.md.
Write functional + non-functional requirements → requirements.md following structured template.
Harsh review of requirements vs completeness, feasibility, testability → requirements_critique.md.
Write functional + non-functional requirements → requirements.md following structured template.
Harsh review of requirements vs completeness, feasibility, testability → requirements_critique.md.
Turn verified requirements into executable BDD scenarios → features/*.feature.
Assess stakeholders, constraints, risks, effort estimate → scope_assessment.md.
Analyze cross-cutting impact of changes → impact_map.json with file/module focus areas.
Propose 2-3 architecture options with trade-offs → design_options.md.
Write Architecture Decision Record for chosen design → adr.md with context, decision, consequences.
Define API contracts, data models, migrations → api_contracts.yaml, schema.md.
Define metrics, logs, traces, SLOs → observability_spec.md.
Map BDD scenarios to test types, coverage targets → test_plan.md.
Break design into subtasks, define rollout strategy → work_plan.md.
Validate design vs constraints and requirements → design_critique.md.
Ensure clean tree, create feature branch with conventional naming.
Load relevant context for subtask → subtask_context_manifest.json.
Detect ambiguities, draft clarification questions → clarification_questions.md.
Write/update tests → tests/*, test_changes_summary.md.
Harsh review of tests vs BDD/spec → test_critique.md. Never fixes.
Write/update tests → tests/*, test_changes_summary.md.
Harsh review of tests vs BDD/spec → test_critique.md. Never fixes.
Write/update tests → tests/*, test_changes_summary.md.
Harsh review of tests vs BDD/spec → test_critique.md. Never fixes.
Write/update tests → tests/*, test_changes_summary.md.
Harsh review of tests vs BDD/spec → test_critique.md. Never fixes.
Write code to pass tests, follow ADR → src/*, impl_changes_summary.md.
Harsh review of code vs ADR/contracts → code_critique.md. Never fixes.
Write code to pass tests, follow ADR → src/*, impl_changes_summary.md.
Harsh review of code vs ADR/contracts → code_critique.md. Never fixes.
Write code to pass tests, follow ADR → src/*, impl_changes_summary.md.
Harsh review of code vs ADR/contracts → code_critique.md. Never fixes.
Write code to pass tests, follow ADR → src/*, impl_changes_summary.md.
Harsh review of code vs ADR/contracts → code_critique.md. Never fixes.
Run mutation tests to identify weak spots → mutation_report.md.
Apply targeted fixes from critics and mutations → fix_summary.md.
Update docs, READMEs, API docs → doc_updates.md.
Final review → self_review.md, build_receipt.json with per-dimension verdicts.
Stage changes, compose commit message, commit to feature branch.
